message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling you a unique product that I think you'll really like. I'm looking for $120 for it. Would you be interested?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Is $110 a price you'd be willing to consider?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I can do $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I can meet you halfway, so how about $112.50? It's the best I can do at this point.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you do $105? That's the best I can do at this point.
